transcript:
Baby, take my hand
I want you to be my best friend
'Cause you're my Iron Man
And I love you 3000
Baby, take a chance
'Cause I want this to be somethin'
Straight out of a Hollywood movie
I see this in my head
Nothing feels as bad
So now all that can change
Is where is the ring?
'Cause I know you wanna ask
Scared the moment will pass
I can see it in your eyes
Just take me by surprise
And all my friends, they tell me, "Fayze, he"
"You're planning to get on one knee"
But I want it to be out of the blue
So make sure I have no clue when you ask
Baby, take my hand
I want you to be my best friend
'Cause you're my Iron Man
takeaways: Bài hát thể hiện tình yêu sâu đậm và mong muốn mối quan hệ tiến xa hơn.
Người hát muốn một lời cầu hôn bất ngờ, không hề có sự chuẩn bị trước.
Bài hát gợi lên hình ảnh một tình yêu đẹp như trong phim Hollywood.
